title: [Invitation] Galaxy Unpacked January 2025: The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences - Samsung Mobile Press
summary:
[Invitation] Galaxy Unpacked January 2025: The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences

Date: January 22, 2025

Source: Samsung Electronics

Get ready for AI that is more natural and intuitive. The next evolution of Galaxy AI is coming and it’s going to change the way you interact with the world every day.

  • Samsung Electronics will unveil new Galaxy innovations on January 22, 2025.
  • The event will stream live on various Samsung platforms starting at 10 a.m. PT.
  • Viewers can stay updated with teasers and trailers at samsungmobilepress.com.
“The new Galaxy S series is about to set the bar once again for mobile AI experiences now and into the future.”

This event promises to introduce significant advancements in mobile AI technology, enhancing user interaction and convenience.

title: iPhone 17 to change an important design element - GSMArena.com
Samsung Expands ‘AI for All’ Vision at CES 2025 To Bring AI Everyday, Everywhere - samsung.com
AMD debuts AI-optimized laptop processor that can run large language models - SiliconANGLE News
summary:
AMD debuts AI-optimized laptop processor that can run large language models

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: SiliconANGLE

Advanced Micro Devices Inc. has launched a new laptop processor series that runs AI models faster than some graphics cards.

  • The Ryzen AI Max Series includes processors that combine CPU, GPU, and NPU functionalities.
  • The flagship processor, Ryzen AI Max+ 395, boasts 16 cores and advanced performance features.
  • The processor can run large language models with significant efficiency compared to standalone GPUs.
  • AMD also announced gaming-oriented processors in the Ryzen 9000HX Series.
“Using the Ryzen AI Max+ 395 provided 2.2 times better performance than Nvidia’s RTX 4090 GPU using less power.”

This new release emphasizes AMD's commitment to integrating AI capabilities into consumer technology.
newTitle: AMD Unveils AI-Optimized Laptop Processor for Large Language Models

title: Samsung Expands ‘AI for All’ Vision at CES 2025 To Bring AI Everyday, Everywhere - news.samsung.com
summary:
Samsung Expands ‘AI for All’ Vision at CES 2025 To Bring AI Everyday, Everywhere

Date: January 2025 | Source: Samsung News

Samsung Electronics unveils its new “AI for All” vision at CES® 2025, focusing on making AI an everyday experience. The company aims to redefine home experiences through advanced AI capabilities across connected devices.

  • Introduction of the AI for All concept at CES 2025 aimed at enhancing user experiences.
  • Commitment to personalized Home AI services through connected devices.
  • Focus on security and privacy with Samsung Knox Matrix and simplified management.
  • Integration of SmartThings for a personalized smart home experience.
  • Launch of AI PCs, Galaxy Book5 Pro and Galaxy Book5 360, designed for productivity.
  • New AI features in entertainment and appliances, enhancing user interactivity.
  • Establishment of SmartThings Pro for B2B solutions, optimizing energy management.
  • Collaboration with Hyundai to bring SmartThings to EVs, enhancing user convenience.
  • Commitment to sustainability and accessibility through AI advancements.
“This year at CES, we are reinforcing our commitment to delivering personalized experiences through our widespread implementation of AI.” - Jong-Hee (JH) Han

Samsung's initiatives position them at the forefront of integrating AI into everyday life, aiming for a future where technology seamlessly enhances user experiences across various domains.
newTitle: Samsung Expands ‘AI for All’ Vision at CES 2025 To Bring AI Everyday, Everywhere

title: Intel introduces new Core Ultra 200 laptop processors - SiliconANGLE News
summary:
Intel Introduces New Core Ultra 200 Laptop Processors

Publication Date: October 10, 2024 - Source: SiliconANGLE

Intel Corporation has unveiled a new range of more than a dozen laptop processors as part of their Core Ultra 200 product line, which aims to enhance performance for creative applications and gaming.

  • Introduction of 11 new Core Ultra 200HX processors designed for high-end laptops.
  • Flagship model, Core Ultra 9 285HX, features 8 performance-optimized cores, achieving speeds of up to 5.4 GHz.
  • Compared to previous generations, the new series boasts a 20% increase in multi-threaded performance.
  • Launch of Core Ultra 200U series focused on ultra-portable laptops with a power-efficient design.
  • Improvements to vPro technology for better enterprise management and cybersecurity.
  • Future AI PCs plans with Intel's 18A product expected by the second half of 2025.
“Intel is only going to continue bolstering its AI PC product portfolio in 2025 and beyond.” – Michelle Johnston Holthaus, Intel CEO.

With these new processors, Intel is positioning itself strongly in the high-performance laptop market, aiming to meet the growing demands for power-efficient and high-capacity computing solutions.
newTitle: Intel Introduces New Core Ultra 200 Laptop Processors

title: AMD Announces Expanded Consumer and Commercial AI PC Portfolio at CES - GlobeNewswire
summary:
AMD Expands AI PC Lineup with New Processors at CES 2025

Date: Jan. 06, 2025    Source: Globe Newswire

AMD has unveiled new high-performance processors, further establishing its leadership in the AI PC market. The new lineup includes the Ryzen AI Max and 300 Series processors, designed for both consumers and commercial usage.

  • AMD introduced the Ryzen AI Max Series processors with up to 16 CPU cores and 50 TOPS of AI processing.
  • The Ryzen AI 300 Series expands premium AI capabilities across notebooks.
  • Enterprise-grade security features are integrated into the Ryzen PRO Series for business PCs.
  • New processors are expected to be available starting in Q1 2025.
“As consumers and professionals increasingly recognize the productivity benefits of AI PCs, AMD is further increasing its performance leadership in the market,” said Jack Huynh, senior vice president.

The latest processor lineup aims to enhance AI capabilities in mobile and business environments, driving innovation in performance and productivity.
newTitle: AMD Expands AI PC Lineup with New Processors at CES 2025

title: AMD Takes On Intel, Apple And Nvidia With Ryzen AI Max Chips - CRN
summary:
AMD Takes On Intel, Apple And Nvidia With Ryzen AI Max Chips

Publication Date: CES 2025

Source: CRN

AMD introduces its new Ryzen AI Max chips designed to enhance AI capabilities in PCs, emphasizing performance and memory architecture improvements.

  • Ryzen AI Max series introduces a new unified memory architecture allowing up to 96 GB of system memory for the GPU.
  • AMD claims that the Ryzen AI Max is the most advanced mobile x86 processor ever created.
  • The series has significantly higher core counts compared to previous models, targeting performance against Intel, Apple, and Nvidia.
  • Features a new NPU capable of 50 trillion operations per second and enhanced memory bandwidth of 256 GB/s.
  • Set to debut in several Copilot+ PC designs, including models from HP and Asus.
“The Ryzen AI Max processor is really a game changer for creators, artists and developers.” - Rahul Tikoo, AMD

This new chip series promises to reshape the PC landscape, challenging competitors like Intel and Apple while enhancing consumer and commercial laptop offerings.
newTitle: AMD Takes On Intel, Apple And Nvidia With Ryzen AI Max Chips

title: HP Inc. Unleashes New AI PCs At CES 2025, Wins Three Innovation Awards - CRN
summary:
HP Inc. Unleashes New AI PCs At CES 2025, Wins Three Innovation Awards

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: HP News

HP Inc. introduced a range of new AI-powered PCs at CES 2025, catering to various user needs, and received three innovation awards for its outstanding advancements.

  • HP introduced the OmniBook Ultra Flip, a powerful 2-in-1 device tailored for business users.
  • The company also launched the OmniStudio X Series, featuring high-end all-in-one desktops.
  • HP’s new EliteBook line, including the EliteBook X and Ultra G1i, focuses on enhancing productivity with cutting-edge AI capabilities.
“People now want tools that can enable them to work faster, think more creatively and connect on a deeper level.” - Jinyu Mao, HP’s Senior Director of Product Planning

With AI features integrated across its product line, HP aims to meet the evolving demands of the workforce.
newTitle: HP Inc. Unveils AI PC Innovations at CES 2025, Soars with Awards

title: AMD announces next-gen Radeon RX 9070-series GPUs with AI-powered FSR 4 upscaling - The Verge
summary:
AMD Unveils Next-Gen Radeon RX 9070-Series GPUs with AI-Driven FSR 4 Upscaling

Publication Date: January 5, 2025

Source: The Verge

AMD has announced its next-generation GPUs at CES, featuring the new RDNA 4 architecture and AI-powered FidelityFX Super Resolution 4 (FSR 4). The Radeon RX 9070 XT and RX 9070 are set to be released in Q1 without disclosed specifications or pricing.

  • New RDNA 4 GPUs offer improved AI capabilities and enhanced ray-tracing performance.
  • FSR 4 is a specialized upscaling technology that works exclusively with the new 9000-series graphics cards.
  • Matt Booty of Microsoft confirmed FSR 4 will be featured in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.
  • AMD has not specified how FSR 4 will compare to Nvidia's DLSS technology.
  • New features in AMD's Adrenalin software include AI image generation and document summarization.
“This RDNA 4 architecture will also enable AMD to launch FSR 4 with these 9000-series GPUs.”

AMD is set to provide further details on the GPUs and their features leading up to their launch. The jump to 9000-series branding skips the 8000 series for mobile.
newTitle: AMD Unveils Next-Gen Radeon RX 9070-Series GPUs with AI-Driven FSR 4 Upscaling

Samsung Galaxy S24 family receives third One UI 7 beta - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Family Receives Third One UI 7 Beta Update

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: GSM Arena

Samsung has started rolling out the third public beta build of One UI 7 based on Android 15 to the Galaxy S24 series in Germany, with updates expected to reach other regions soon.

  • New build includes the January 2025 security patch.
  • Fixes issues with vertical scrolling, MMS image saving, Quick Panel responsiveness, and lock screen editing.
  • Volume key and Edge Panels issues resolved.
  • Game Booster now defaults to 120 Hz.
  • Available for manual update in Settings > Software Update for beta program participants.
“The new build enhances the user experience while ensuring device security.”

This update signifies Samsung's commitment to improving user experience through continuous software enhancements, benefiting all Galaxy S24 series users.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S24 Family Receives Third One UI 7 Beta Update

title: Alphabet to bring Gemini AI to TV sets running on Google operating system - Business Standard
summary:
Alphabet to Bring Gemini AI to TV Sets Running on Google Operating System

Publication Date: Jan 06 2025 | Source: Bloomberg

Alphabet Inc. is set to enhance third-party TV sets running on Google’s operating system with the Gemini AI upgrade, allowing more natural voice interactions.

  • The Gemini upgrade will enable users to hold back-and-forth conversations with their TVs without needing to say “Hey Google” for each command.
  • This marks the first introduction of Gemini to third-party TVs from manufacturers like Sony, Hisense, and TCL.
  • The upgraded software also features improved content search and integration with YouTube.
  • A new “always-on” mode will show information based on user proximity to the TV, with TCL being the first to implement it in late 2025.
“The Gemini upgrade will allow users to hold back-and-forth conversations with third-party TVs without the need to use the ‘Hey Google’ trigger phrase for each command.”

This upgrade signifies a substantial advancement in user interaction with Google TV, enhancing convenience and functionality.
newTitle: Alphabet to Introduce Gemini AI to Google TV Sets

title: Hisense’s TriChroma TV could be the middle ground between Mini LED and MicroLED - The Verge
summary:
Hisense’s TriChroma TV could be the middle ground between Mini LED and MicroLED

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Hisense Press Release

Hisense showcases its new large-scale TVs at CES, featuring the 136-inch MicroLED and the 116-inch TriChroma LED TV, aiming to enhance home theater experiences.

  • The 136-inch MicroLED 136MX is touted as a consumer-ready MicroLED display but remains high-end and expensive.
  • Hisense claims the 136MX represents a significant step towards making cutting-edge display technology more accessible.
  • The TV uses over 24.88 million microscopic LEDs for exceptional brightness and quality without the risk of burn-in.
  • The new TriChroma LED TV utilizes RGB Local Dimming Technology to achieve a vibrant color spectrum and high brightness levels.
  • The TriChroma is reported to cover 97% of the BT.2020 color space, making it superior in color vibrance among Mini LED displays.
  • No pricing or release date information is available yet for the TriChroma TV.

The 136MX builds on Hisense’s legacy of display innovation, leveraging a high-density array of over 24.88 million microscopic LEDs to deliver unparalleled brightness, resolution, and precision.

Both TVs aim to redefine viewing experiences, but they remain high-end options for most consumers.
newTitle: Hisense’s TriChroma TV: The New Frontier Between Mini LED and MicroLED

title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series leaks: Designs and colours leaked ahead of anticipated launch | Mint - Mint
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Leaks Reveal Designs and Color Options

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Live Mint

The highly anticipated Samsung Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, is expected to launch soon with exciting design features and color options based on recent leaks.

  • Three variants are expected: Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra.
  • Powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite octa-core chipset for top-tier performance.
  • Design leaks reveal color options, including Icy Blue for the base model and Titanium Blue for the Ultra variant.
  • Both models are expected to feature a MagSafe-like ring for magnetic wireless charging.
  • The devices boast slim bezels, a centrally located camera cutout, and a sleek design.
  • A variety of colors will be available, including options like navy and coral red for the Galaxy S25 and S25+, and titanium black and jade green for the Ultra variant.
“Fans of Samsung are eagerly awaiting the official unveiling of these exciting new devices.”

In summary, the Samsung Galaxy S25 series promises to deliver innovative features and appealing designs, heightening anticipation among consumers ahead of the official launch.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Leaks Reveal Designs and Color Options

summary:
Intel Unveils Next-Gen Core Ultra Processors at CES 2025

Source: CNBC TV18

At the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2025, Intel introduced its latest Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors designed for businesses, creators, and gamers, featuring advanced AI capabilities and enhanced efficiency.

  • Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors showcased at CES 2025.
  • New processors feature over 400 AI capabilities for improved productivity.
  • Products aimed at businesses include Core Ultra 200V series equipped with Intel vPro technology.
  • Collaboration with Microsoft for AI-driven solutions in Copilot+ PCs.
  • Mobile processors for creators and gamers (200HX and H series) focus on performance while reducing power consumption.
  • Core Ultra 200U series balances performance, power efficiency, and affordability.
“Intel Core Ultra processors are redefining mobile AI and graphics, once again showcasing the superior performance and efficiency of the x86 architecture.” - Michelle Johnston Holthaus, Intel CEO

CES 2025: This Smart Mirror Can Show Multiple Health Data by Reading Faces

Source: Times of India

This article discusses how a new smart mirror showcased at CES 2025 can analyze various health data simply by reading the facial features of users.

  • The mirror uses facial recognition technology to gather health metrics.
  • It provides personal insights tailored to each user.

“This could revolutionize how we monitor our health at home,” said a leading tech expert.

In conclusion, the smart mirror introduced at CES 2025 represents a significant advancement in personal health technology, offering users a unique way to engage with their health data.

title: Red Magic 10 Pro will soon be available in a new color called Lightspeed - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
Red Magic 10 Pro will soon be available in a new color called Lightspeed - GSMArena.com
summary:
Red Magic 10 Pro Launches in New 'Lightspeed' Colorway

Publication Date: January 10, 2024
Source: GSMArena

The Red Magic 10 Pro has introduced a new color option called Lightspeed, enhancing its traditional design with a bold, striking look that appeals to gamers.

  • The new colorway will be available starting January 13.
  • The price for the Lightspeed version is set at $649 / €649 / £579.
  • No internal hardware changes; it features the same Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and camera system.
“This new paint job adds a touch of flair to the powerful features that gamers love.”

title: Qi2 is officially coming to Samsung Galaxy devices, Google adding Pixel’s faster speeds - 9to5Google
summary:
Qi2 is officially coming to Samsung Galaxy devices, Google adding Pixel’s faster speeds

Date: January 10, 2025

Source: 9to5Google

At CES 2025, it has been announced that Qi2 will be implemented in Samsung Galaxy devices this year, with Google working on faster charging speeds.

  • Qi2 support is expanding to more Android devices in 2025.
  • The HMD Skyline is currently the only Android phone supporting Qi2.
  • Galaxy devices are confirmed to add Qi2, though specific models are not detailed.
  • There are hints that future Pixel phones will adopt Qi2 and its faster capabilities.
  • Qi2 will include extensions for automotive use cases in the 2.1 standard.

The exceptional Qi2 growth story will continue in 2025. You can expect to see Android devices supporting Qi2 from Samsung Galaxy devices in 2025.

Samsung’s Galaxy S25 series is expected to debut soon, likely incorporating this new charging technology.
newTitle: Qi2 Wireless Charging Standard to Arrive on Samsung Galaxy Devices

title: Apple iPhone 15 is now available for Rs 29,499 on Flipkart, Check the offers here - Kalinga TV
summary:
Apple iPhone 15 is now available for Rs 29,499 on Flipkart, Check the offers here

Publication date: September 2023

Source: Kalinga TV

The Apple iPhone 15 (128GB, Black) is available with a massive discount on Flipkart, allowing customers to purchase it for under Rs 30,000 through various offers.

Initially priced at Rs 79,990 at launch, the iPhone 15 is now available for Rs 29,499 with exchange offers that provide significant savings.

  • The iPhone 15 (128 GB, Black) is currently sold at Rs 60,999, with a discount of 12% off its MRP.
  • Exchange offers allow savings of up to Rs 31,500 with eligible device trade-ins.
  • The device features a 6.1-inch display and multiple color options including pink, yellow, and green.
  • It is equipped with a 48-megapixel primary camera for enhanced photography.
Apple claims the iPhone 15 has “all-day battery life,” but real-world usage suggests it can last over 9 hours on average.

The availability of the iPhone 15 at such a low price presents a considerable opportunity for consumers looking for a premium smartphone.
newTitle: Apple iPhone 15 Now Available on Flipkart for Rs 29,499

title: SpaceX's Starship Flight 7 test flight will deploy simulated Starlink satellites for 1st time - Space.com
summary:
SpaceX's Starship Flight 7 test flight will deploy simulated Starlink satellites for 1st time

Publication Date: January 10, 2023 Source: Space.com

SpaceX is preparing for its next Starship flight test, marking a significant step toward full reusability of the launch system. Scheduled for January 10, the flight will see Starship deploy simulated Starlink satellites for the first time.

  • Launch from South Texas is set for 5:00 p.m. Eastern.
  • The new test aims to validate the payload deployment capability of Starship.
  • Super Heavy booster reusing Raptor engine will attempt a catch return.
  • Upgrades on the vehicle include a redesigned heat shield and sensor enhancements.
"This new year will be transformational for Starship, with the goal of bringing reuse of the entire system online," SpaceX.

The upcoming flight is poised to test advancements in the Starship system as SpaceX aims for more ambitious missions to Earth, the Moon, and Mars.
newTitle: SpaceX's Starship Flight 7 Will Test Launch of Simulated Starlink Satellites

title: Qualcomm brings its Snapdragon X chips to mid-range Windows laptops and desktops - TechCrunch
summary:
Qualcomm brings its Snapdragon X chips to mid-range Windows laptops and desktops

Publication Date: January 2025  |  Source: TechCrunch

Qualcomm is entering the mid-range PC market with its new Snapdragon X chip, promising extended battery life and performance.

  • Unveiled at CES 2025, the Snapdragon X is built on a 4nm process.
  • Qualcomm aims to address software compatibility issues with Windows to compete against AMD and Intel.
  • Market data shows Qualcomm captured only 0.8% of the PC market share in Q3 2024.
  • The Snapdragon X will power AI-enhanced PCs from major manufacturers, expected to launch in early 2025.
  • It features robust connectivity options, including support for Wi-Fi 7 and UHD monitor outputs.
“There are over 60 Copilot+ PC designs powered by Snapdragon now available or in development,” Peter Burns, Qualcomm’s senior director of product marketing, stated.

In summary, Qualcomm's Snapdragon X chips aim to create more affordable and efficient PCs while tackling challenges of market competition.
newTitle: Qualcomm Launches Snapdragon X Chips for Mid-Range PCs

title: The next generation of Google TVs will let you talk to Gemini without a remote - Android Police
summary:
Google TV Introduces Remote-Free Voice Assistant with Gemini Integration

Date: January 2025 Source: Android Police

Google TV is innovating with new features set to launch in 2025, allowing users to engage with their TVs without needing a remote control. The upcoming devices will integrate advanced voice capabilities and personalized widgets.

  • New Google TVs will feature far-field microphones for hands-free interaction with the voice assistant.
  • Proximity sensors will enable on-screen hubs with personalized information when users approach the TV.
  • Gemini integration enhances voice commands and conversation continuity, allowing deeper interactions.
  • Launch partners like Hisense and TCL are confirmed for the new features.
  • Some functionalities may be retrofitted onto existing devices, depending on hardware compatibility.
“With Gemini, Google TV’s voice assistant will be able to create a more conversational experience.”

These innovations reflect Google's commitment to enhancing user experience with intuitive control.
newTitle: Google TV Introduces Remote-Free Voice Assistant with Gemini Integration

title: Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon X chips bring Windows on Arm to cheaper laptops - The Verge
summary:
Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon X chips bring Windows on Arm to cheaper laptops

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: The Verge

Qualcomm has launched its latest Snapdragon X chip, aimed at making Windows on Arm laptops more accessible at prices starting around $600. This new chip will power a variety of devices from major manufacturers.

  • The Snapdragon X joins the existing Snapdragon X Plus and X Elite.
  • Designed for mainstream and budget laptops, it promises better performance per watt than Intel’s Core 5 120U.
  • Includes a 45 TOPS NPU for supporting Microsoft’s Copilot Plus features.
  • First Qualcomm-powered mini desktop PCs are also on the horizon.
  • Over 60 laptop designs in production or development based on this chip, with more than 100 expected by 2026.
“Windows on Arm momentum isn’t slowing down.”

This new chip from Qualcomm represents a significant shift in the laptop market, especially impacting the $600 price range and increasing competition with Intel.
newTitle: Qualcomm Unveils Affordable Snapdragon X Chips for Windows on Arm Laptops

title: Google Wants Your TV to Know When You're In the Room - CNET
summary:
Google Wants Your TV to Know When You're In the Room

Publication Date: January 6, 2025
Source: CNET

Google has unveiled a new ambient mode for Google TV devices that allows them to detect when a person enters a room and display relevant information like news and weather without any input from the user.

  • The new feature was demonstrated at CES 2025.
  • The TVs will use radar-like technology to sense motion instead of cameras, prioritizing privacy and cost.
  • Existing presence detection features offered by competitors like Amazon and Sony are noted.
  • Google aims to make its TVs more of a living room hub, enhanced by AI upgrades with Gemini models.
"Our vision is that this can be something so much more," - Jamieson Brettle, Google product manager.

The upcoming Google TV products that support this feature are expected to launch later this year.
newTitle: Google Introduces Ambient Mode for TVs at CES 2025

title: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 TOTY - Vote Men's Team Of The Year - Electronic Arts Home Page
OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features - The Economic Times
summary:
OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: OnePlus Press Release

The much-anticipated launch of the OnePlus 13 series will take place during the Winter Launch Event, showcasing advanced features and specifications.

Where and When to Watch the Livestream

The event will be live-streamed on OnePlus India’s official YouTube channel, website, and social media channels.

OnePlus 13: What to Expect?

  • 6.82-inch BOE X2 2K+ AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with up to 24GB of LPDDR5X RAM.
  • Features a Hasselblad-powered triple-camera system with three 50MP sensors.
  • 6,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging capabilities.
  • Available in three colors: Midnight Ocean, Arctic Dawn, and Black Eclipse.
  • IP68 and IP69 water and dust resistance ratings.

OnePlus 13R: The Affordable Flagship

Also launching is the OnePlus 13R, offering high-end features at a competitive price point. It will feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and up to 16GB of RAM.

OnePlus Buds Pro 3

The event will unveil the Sapphire Blue variant of OnePlus Buds Pro 3, featuring AI Translation capabilities.

Accessories and Pricing Expectations

The OnePlus 13 is expected to be priced between Rs 67,000 and Rs 70,000, with the OnePlus 13R under Rs 40,000.

Mark your calendars for January 7, 2025, to witness OnePlus's latest innovations.
newTitle: OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features
